attributes.action: Change the school holidays rule.Allow parents 10 days holiday during term time.
attributes.background: Parents are wrongly being fined for taking children on holiday during term time.Family holidays are as important as school.Please sign the petition to show your support.Thank you.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106133

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
